**Example community formats & talks:**

Sometimes it can be helpful to borrow from other community organizers, rather than starting from scratch. Here are a few formats that have worked for others: 

---
listing:
  contents: "posts/*/index.qmd"
  feed: true
  type: grid
  categories: true
  sort-ui: true
  filter-ui: true
  image-placeholder: images/image-placeholder.png
  fields: [image, date, title, description]
page-layout: full
title-block-banner: true
---
